name: Parallel (itch) (IGAD Breda University of Applied Science, Nick Wagter)
name_original: Parallel (itch) (IGAD Breda University of Applied Science, Nick Wagter)
description:
Parallel is a futuristic racing game that takes place on a distant planet where local mining colonies extract ore. Piloting one of three hovercraft variations, show your racing skills with our unique double thruster controls.

But watch out!

The rare ore's volatile nature caused a massive explosion and rifts in time started to appear.  Passing through one of these rifts will send you to another timeline - use this to your advantage to sneak up on your opponents and stop players behind you from taking advantage of your slipstream.

Features:

  • 3 unique maps to master and explore
  • 3  unique vehicles to fit your play-style
  • Double thruster control scheme
  • Split Screen [Coming Soon] 

Notes from the team:

Hello everyone, we are a second year student game from Breda University of Applied Sciences in The Netherlands.

The project is in pre-release, which means that there is still a lot of content to be optimized and polished. 

We hope that you will enjoy this early version of the game! 

We would love to hear about all your experiences, so we can can make improvements to the game based off of your feedback!

How to play
developers: IGAD Breda University of Applied Science
